<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <LinearLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto" android:orientation="vertical" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent">
<com.google.android.material.appbar.MaterialToolbar android:id="@+id/toolbar" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" app:backgroundTint="@color/brand_celeste" app:titleTextColor="@color/white"/>
<TextView android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:padding="16dp" android:text="Bienvenido, Admin" android:textSize="18sp"/> </LinearLayout>

option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <ScrollView xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent">
<LinearLayout android:orientation="vertical" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:padding="16dp">
<com.google.android.material.appbar.MaterialToolbar android:id="@+id/toolbar" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" app:backgroundTint="@color/brand_celeste" app:titleTextColor="@color/white" />
<TextView android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="@string/dashboard_admin" android:textSize="20sp" android:textStyle="bold" android:layout_marginTop="12dp" />
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="horizontal" android:layout_marginTop="12dp">
<com.google.android.material.card.MaterialCardView android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_weight="1" android:layout_height="wrap_content" app:cardCornerRadius="8dp" app:cardElevation="4dp">
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="vertical" android:padding="12dp">
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="@string/label_reservations" android:textSize="12sp" android:textColor="@color/neutral_500" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/tReservationsCount" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="128" android:textStyle="bold" android:textSize="20sp" android:layout_marginTop="6dp" /> </LinearLayout> </com.google.android.material.card.MaterialCardView>
<com.google.android.material.card.MaterialCardView android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_weight="1" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginStart="8dp" app:cardCornerRadius="8dp" app:cardElevation="4dp">
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="vertical" android:padding="12dp">
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="@string/label_revenue" android:textSize="12sp" android:textColor="@color/neutral_500" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/tRevenue" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="S/. 12,400" android:textStyle="bold" android:textSize="20sp" android:layout_marginTop="6dp" /> </LinearLayout> </com.google.android.material.card.MaterialCardView>
</LinearLayout>
<!-- Quick actions placeholder --> <TextView android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="@string/quick_actions" android:textStyle="bold" android:layout_marginTop="16dp" />
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="horizontal" android:layout_marginTop="8dp">
<Button android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="@string/action_export" />
<Button android:layout_marginStart="8dp" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="@string/notifications" />
</LinearLayout>
</LinearLayout> </ScrollView>

option.name: originalContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <LinearLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto" android:orientation="vertical" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent">
<com.google.android.material.appbar.MaterialToolbar android:id="@+id/toolbar" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="?attr/actionBarSize" android:background="@color/brand_celeste" android:titleTextColor="@android:color/white" />
<LinearLayout android:orientation="vertical" android:padding="16dp" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:layout_marginBottom="8dp">
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="horizontal" android:gravity="center_vertical">
<TextView android:id="@+id/tvHello" android:text="Hola Usuario" android:textSize="20sp" android:textStyle="bold" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_weight="1" android:layout_height="wrap_content" />
<Button android:id="@+id/btnHistory" android:text="Historial" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:backgroundTint="@color/brand_celeste" /> </LinearLayout>
<com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputLayout android:hint="¿A dónde ir?" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginTop="8dp"> <com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputEditText android:id="@+id/inputSearch" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" /> </com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputLayout>
<TextView android:text="Departamentos" android:textStyle="bold" android:layout_marginTop="12dp" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" />
<androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView android:id="@+id/rvDepartments" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="90dp" android:layout_marginTop="6dp" />
<TextView android:text="Mejores calificadas" android:textStyle="bold" android:layout_marginTop="12dp" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" />
<androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView android:id="@+id/rvCompanies" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginTop="8dp" />
</LinearLayout> </LinearLayout>

option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <!-- Redesigned Client Home: hero, search bar floating, departments carousel, pinterest-style grid of companies, recommended tours and quick actions --> <androidx.coordinatorlayout.widget.CoordinatorLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:background="@color/base">
<com.google.android.material.appbar.MaterialToolbar android:id="@+id/toolbar" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:background="@drawable/gradient_primary" app:titleTextColor="@android:color/white" app:popupTheme="@style/ThemeOverlay.MaterialComponents.Light" />
<androidx.core.widget.NestedScrollView android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:layout_marginTop="0dp" app:layout_behavior="@string/appbar_scrolling_view_behavior">
<LinearLayout android:orientation="vertical" android:padding="16dp" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content">
<!-- HERO --> <RelativeLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="140dp" android:background="@drawable/gradient_cool" android:padding="16dp" android:clipToPadding="false" android:clipToOutline="true">
<LinearLayout android:orientation="vertical" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="match_parent">
<TextView android:id="@+id/tvHello" android:text="@string/hello_user" android:textSize="20sp" android:textStyle="bold" android:textColor="@color/white" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/tvSubHello" android:text="@string/hello_sub" android:textSize="14sp" android:textColor="@color/overlay_light" android:layout_marginTop="6dp" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" /> </LinearLayout>
<com.google.android.material.card.MaterialCardView android:layout_width="56dp" android:layout_height="56dp" android:layout_alignParentEnd="true" android:layout_centerVertical="true" app:cardCornerRadius="28dp" app:cardElevation="6dp">
<ImageView android:id="@+id/imgAvatar" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:src="@drawable/ic_person_24" android:contentDescription="@string/hero_logo_desc" android:padding="8dp" /> </com.google.android.material.card.MaterialCardView>
<!-- Floating search bar --> <com.google.android.material.card.MaterialCardView android:id="@+id/searchCard" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="56dp" android:layout_alignParentBottom="true" android:layout_marginStart="16dp" android:layout_marginEnd="16dp" app:cardCornerRadius="12dp" app:cardElevation="8dp" android:translationY="28dp">
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:orientation="horizontal" android:gravity="center_vertical" android:paddingStart="12dp" android:paddingEnd="12dp">
<ImageView android:layout_width="24dp" android:layout_height="24dp" android:src="@drawable/search_24px" app:tint="@color/neutral_400" android:contentDescription="@string/search_icon_desc" />
<com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputEditText android:id="@+id/inputSearch" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:hint="@string/search_hint" android:background="@null" android:paddingStart="12dp" android:paddingEnd="12dp" />
</LinearLayout> </com.google.android.material.card.MaterialCardView>
</RelativeLayout>
<!-- Quick actions --> <LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="horizontal" android:gravity="center_vertical" android:layout_marginTop="28dp">
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_weight="1" android:orientation="vertical" android:gravity="center_horizontal">
<com.google.android.material.card.MaterialCardView android:layout_width="56dp" android:layout_height="56dp" app:cardCornerRadius="28dp" app:cardElevation="6dp"> <ImageView android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:src="@drawable/ic_map" android:padding="12dp" android:contentDescription="@string/action_explore_desc" /> </com.google.android.material.card.MaterialCardView>
<TextView android:layout_marginTop="8dp" android:text="@string/action_explore" android:textSize="12sp" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" /> </LinearLayout>
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_weight="1" android:orientation="vertical" android:gravity="center_horizontal">
<com.google.android.material.card.MaterialCardView android:layout_width="56dp" android:layout_height="56dp" app:cardCornerRadius="28dp" app:cardElevation="6dp"> <ImageView android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:src="@drawable/ic_add_24" android:padding="12dp" android:contentDescription="@string/action_book_desc" /> </com.google.android.material.card.MaterialCardView>
<TextView android:layout_marginTop="8dp" android:text="@string/action_book" android:textSize="12sp" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" /> </LinearLayout>
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_weight="1" android:orientation="vertical" android:gravity="center_horizontal">
<com.google.android.material.card.MaterialCardView android:layout_width="56dp" android:layout_height="56dp" app:cardCornerRadius="28dp" app:cardElevation="6dp"> <ImageView android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:src="@drawable/ic_person_24" android:padding="12dp" android:contentDescription="@string/action_profile_desc" /> </com.google.android.material.card.MaterialCardView>
<TextView android:layout_marginTop="8dp" android:text="@string/action_profile" android:textSize="12sp" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" /> </LinearLayout>
</LinearLayout>
<!-- Departments carousel --> <TextView android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="@string/departments" android:textStyle="bold" android:layout_marginTop="16dp" />
<androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView android:id="@+id/rvDepartments" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="110dp" android:layout_marginTop="8dp" android:orientation="horizontal" />
<!-- Companies grid (Pinterest style) --> <TextView android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="@string/companies" android:textStyle="bold" android:layout_marginTop="12dp" />
<androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView android:id="@+id/rvCompanies" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginTop="8dp" />
<!-- Recommended tours --> <TextView android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="@string/recommended_tours" android:textStyle="bold" android:layout_marginTop="16dp" />
<androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView android:id="@+id/rvRecommendedTours" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginTop="8dp" android:orientation="horizontal" />
</LinearLayout> </androidx.core.widget.NestedScrollView>
</androidx.coordinatorlayout.widget.CoordinatorLayout>

option.name: originalContent
option.value:
<LinearLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:orientation="vertical" android:gravity="center_horizontal">
<!-- Toolbar superior --> <com.google.android.material.appbar.MaterialToolbar android:id="@+id/toolbar" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="?attr/actionBarSize" android:background="@color/brand_celeste" android:title="Reservas" android:titleTextColor="@android:color/white" />
<!-- Nombre del tour --> <TextView android:id="@+id/tTourName" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginTop="16dp" android:layout_marginBottom="16dp" android:text="Tour 1" android:textSize="18sp" android:textStyle="bold" />
<!-- Cantidad de personas --> <TextView android:id="@+id/tTourPeople" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Cupo: -" android:layout_marginTop="8dp" android:textSize="16sp" />
<!-- Fechas del tour --> <TextView android:id="@+id/tTourDates" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Fechas: -" android:layout_marginTop="4dp" android:textSize="16sp" />
<!-- Total del tour --> <TextView android:id="@+id/tTotal" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Total: S/. 0.0" android:textSize="16sp" android:textStyle="bold" android:layout_marginTop="16dp" android:layout_marginBottom="16dp"/>
<!-- Botón para confirmar la reserva --> <Button android:id="@+id/btnConfirm" android:layout_width="214dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Confirmar reserva" android:backgroundTint="@color/brand_celeste" /> </LinearLayout>

option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <ScrollView xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent">
<LinearLayout android:orientation="vertical" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:padding="16dp">
<com.google.android.material.appbar.MaterialToolbar android:id="@+id/toolbar" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" app:backgroundTint="@color/brand_celeste" app:titleTextColor="@color/white" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/tTourName" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="@string/tour_title_placeholder" android:textSize="20sp" android:textStyle="bold" android:layout_marginTop="12dp" />
<!-- Visual summary --> <com.google.android.material.card.MaterialCardView android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="180dp" app:cardCornerRadius="12dp" app:cardElevation="6dp" android:layout_marginTop="12dp">
<ImageView android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:src="@drawable/logo_silkroad" android:scaleType="centerCrop" android:contentDescription="@string/tour_title_placeholder" /> </com.google.android.material.card.MaterialCardView>
<!-- Price breakdown --> <TextView android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="@string/price_breakdown" android:textStyle="bold" android:layout_marginTop="12dp" />
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="vertical" android:padding="12dp" android:background="@color/surface_container">
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="horizontal">
<TextView android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_weight="1" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="@string/fee_base" />
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="@string/price_base_amount" /> </LinearLayout>
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="horizontal" android:layout_marginTop="8dp">
<TextView android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_weight="1" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="@string/taxes" />
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="@string/price_taxes_amount" /> </LinearLayout>
<View android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="1dp" android:background="@color/neutral_200" android:layout_marginTop="12dp" android:layout_marginBottom="12dp"/>
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="horizontal">
<TextView android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_weight="1" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="@string/total_label" android:textStyle="bold" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/tTotal" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="@string/price_total_amount" android:textStyle="bold" /> </LinearLayout>
</LinearLayout>
<!-- Trust indicators --> <LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="horizontal" android:gravity="center_vertical" android:layout_marginTop="12dp">
<ImageView android:layout_width="24dp" android:layout_height="24dp" android:src="@drawable/shape_circle_white" android:contentDescription="@string/secure_payment" />
<TextView android:layout_marginStart="8dp" android:text="@string/secure_payment" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" />
</LinearLayout>
<com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton android:id="@+id/btnConfirm" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginTop="16dp" android:text="@string/confirm_reservation" app:cornerRadius="12dp" app:backgroundTint="@color/primary" />
</LinearLayout> </ScrollView>

option.name: originalContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <ScrollView xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent">
<LinearLayout android:orientation="vertical" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content">
<com.google.android.material.appbar.MaterialToolbar android:id="@+id/toolbar" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" app:backgroundTint="@color/brand_celeste" app:titleTextColor="@color/white"/>
<!-- Header de bienvenida --> <LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="horizontal" android:padding="20dp" android:background="@color/brand_celeste">
<ImageView android:id="@+id/imgGuideProfile" android:layout_width="60dp" android:layout_height="60dp" android:src="@drawable/ic_person_24" android:background="@drawable/bg_chip" android:backgroundTint="@color/white" android:padding="12dp"/>
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_weight="1" android:layout_marginStart="16dp" android:orientation="vertical">
<TextView android:id="@+id/txtWelcomeGuide" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="¡Bienvenido, Guía!" android:textColor="@color/white" android:textSize="20sp" android:textStyle="bold"/>
<TextView android:id="@+id/txtGuideStatus" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Estado: Aprobado ✓" android:textColor="@color/white" android:textSize="14sp"/>
</LinearLayout> </LinearLayout>
<!-- Menú de opciones principales --> <LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="vertical" android:padding="20dp">
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Panel de Control" android:textSize="18sp" android:textStyle="bold" android:layout_marginBottom="16dp"/>
<!-- Ver Ofertas de Tours --> <com.google.android.material.card.MaterialCardView android:id="@+id/cardTourOffers" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginBottom="12dp" app:cardCornerRadius="12dp" app:cardElevation="4dp" android:clickable="true" android:focusable="true" app:rippleColor="@color/brand_celeste">
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="horizontal" android:padding="16dp">
<ImageView android:layout_width="40dp" android:layout_height="40dp" android:src="@drawable/ic_map" android:layout_marginEnd="16dp"/>
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_weight="1" android:orientation="vertical">
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Ver Ofertas de Tours" android:textSize="16sp" android:textStyle="bold"/>
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Revisar y aceptar tours disponibles" android:textSize="14sp" android:textColor="@android:color/darker_gray"/>
</LinearLayout>
<ImageView android:layout_width="24dp" android:layout_height="24dp" android:src="@drawable/ic_arrow_back_24" android:rotation="180"/>
</LinearLayout> </com.google.android.material.card.MaterialCardView>
<!-- Registrar Ubicación --> <com.google.android.material.card.MaterialCardView android:id="@+id/cardLocationTracking" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginBottom="12dp" app:cardCornerRadius="12dp" app:cardElevation="4dp" android:clickable="true" android:focusable="true" app:rippleColor="@color/brand_celeste">
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="horizontal" android:padding="16dp">
<ImageView android:layout_width="40dp" android:layout_height="40dp" android:src="@drawable/ic_map" android:layout_marginEnd="16dp"/>
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_weight="1" android:orientation="vertical">
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Registrar Ubicación" android:textSize="16sp" android:textStyle="bold"/>
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Marcar paradas durante el tour" android:textSize="14sp" android:textColor="@android:color/darker_gray"/>
</LinearLayout>
<ImageView android:layout_width="24dp" android:layout_height="24dp" android:src="@drawable/ic_arrow_back_24" android:rotation="180"/>
</LinearLayout> </com.google.android.material.card.MaterialCardView>
<!-- Escanear QR de Finalización --> <com.google.android.material.card.MaterialCardView android:id="@+id/cardQRScanner" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginBottom="12dp" app:cardCornerRadius="12dp" app:cardElevation="4dp" android:clickable="true" android:focusable="true" app:rippleColor="@color/brand_celeste">
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="horizontal" android:padding="16dp">
<ImageView android:layout_width="40dp" android:layout_height="40dp" android:src="@drawable/qr_code_24" android:layout_marginEnd="16dp"/>
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_weight="1" android:orientation="vertical">
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Finalizar Servicio (QR)" android:textSize="16sp" android:textStyle="bold"/>
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Escanear QR del cliente para check-out" android:textSize="14sp" android:textColor="@android:color/darker_gray"/>
</LinearLayout>
<ImageView android:layout_width="24dp" android:layout_height="24dp" android:src="@drawable/ic_arrow_back_24" android:rotation="180"/>
</LinearLayout> </com.google.android.material.card.MaterialCardView>
<!-- Mi Perfil --> <com.google.android.material.card.MaterialCardView android:id="@+id/cardProfile" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginBottom="12dp" app:cardCornerRadius="12dp" app:cardElevation="4dp" android:clickable="true" android:focusable="true" app:rippleColor="@color/brand_celeste">
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="horizontal" android:padding="16dp">
<ImageView android:layout_width="40dp" android:layout_height="40dp" android:src="@drawable/ic_person_24" android:layout_marginEnd="16dp"/>
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_weight="1" android:orientation="vertical">
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Mi Perfil" android:textSize="16sp" android:textStyle="bold"/>
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Editar datos, ver historial y estadísticas" android:textSize="14sp" android:textColor="@android:color/darker_gray"/>
</LinearLayout>
<ImageView android:layout_width="24dp" android:layout_height="24dp" android:src="@drawable/ic_arrow_back_24" android:rotation="180"/>
</LinearLayout> </com.google.android.material.card.MaterialCardView>
</LinearLayout>
</LinearLayout> </ScrollView>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <ScrollView xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent">
<LinearLayout android:orientation="vertical" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:padding="16dp">
<com.google.android.material.appbar.MaterialToolbar android:id="@+id/toolbar" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" app:backgroundTint="@color/brand_celeste" app:titleTextColor="@color/white" />
<!-- Header con estado --> <LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="horizontal" android:padding="12dp" android:background="@drawable/gradient_primary" android:clipToPadding="false">
<com.google.android.material.card.MaterialCardView android:layout_width="64dp" android:layout_height="64dp" app:cardCornerRadius="32dp" app:cardElevation="6dp"> <ImageView android:id="@+id/imgGuideProfile" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:src="@drawable/ic_person_24" android:padding="12dp" android:contentDescription="@string/hero_logo_desc" /> </com.google.android.material.card.MaterialCardView>
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_weight="1" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="vertical" android:layout_marginStart="12dp">
<TextView android:id="@+id/txtWelcomeGuide" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="@string/welcome_guide" android:textColor="@color/white" android:textSize="18sp" android:textStyle="bold" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/txtGuideStatus" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="@string/guide_status" android:textColor="@color/white" android:textSize="14sp" /> </LinearLayout>
<com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton android:id="@+id/btnToggleStatus" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="@string/on_label" app:cornerRadius="20dp" app:backgroundTint="@color/success" />
</LinearLayout>
<!-- Quick stat cards --> <LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="horizontal" android:layout_marginTop="12dp">
<com.google.android.material.card.MaterialCardView android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_weight="1" android:layout_height="wrap_content" app:cardCornerRadius="12dp" app:cardElevation="4dp">
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="vertical" android:padding="12dp" android:gravity="center">
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="@string/label_tours" android:textSize="12sp" android:textColor="@color/neutral_500" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/tToursCount" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="24" android:textStyle="bold" android:textSize="20sp" android:layout_marginTop="6dp" /> </LinearLayout> </com.google.android.material.card.MaterialCardView>
<com.google.android.material.card.MaterialCardView android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_weight="1" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginStart="8dp" app:cardCornerRadius="12dp" app:cardElevation="4dp">
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="vertical" android:padding="12dp" android:gravity="center">
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="@string/label_rating" android:textSize="12sp" android:textColor="@color/neutral_500" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/tRatingCount" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="4.8" android:textStyle="bold" android:textSize="20sp" android:layout_marginTop="6dp" /> </LinearLayout> </com.google.android.material.card.MaterialCardView>
</LinearLayout>
<!-- Notifications --> <TextView android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="@string/notifications" android:textStyle="bold" android:layout_marginTop="12dp" />
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="vertical" android:layout_marginTop="8dp">
<com.google.android.material.card.MaterialCardView android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" app:cardCornerRadius="8dp" app:cardElevation="2dp">
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="horizontal" android:padding="12dp">
<ImageView android:layout_width="36dp" android:layout_height="36dp" android:src="@drawable/bg_badge_notification" android:contentDescription="@string/desc_offers" />
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="vertical" android:layout_marginStart="8dp">
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="@string/notif_new_reservation" android:textStyle="bold" />
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="@string/notif_review_details" android:textSize="14sp" android:textColor="@android:color/darker_gray" />
</LinearLayout>
</LinearLayout> </com.google.android.material.card.MaterialCardView>
</LinearLayout>
</LinearLayout> </ScrollView>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <ScrollView xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent">
<LinearLayout android:orientation="vertical" android:padding="16dp" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content">
<com.google.android.material.appbar.MaterialToolbar android:id="@+id/toolbar" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="?attr/actionBarSize" android:title="Iniciar sesión" app:backgroundTint="@color/brand_celeste" app:titleTextColor="@color/white" />
<ImageView android:id="@+id/imgLogo" android:layout_width="180dp" android:layout_height="180dp" android:layout_marginTop="20dp" android:layout_gravity="center_horizontal" android:src="@drawable/logo_silkroad" android:contentDescription="@string/app_name" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/tvHola" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="¡Hola!" android:textStyle="bold" android:textSize="22sp" android:layout_marginTop="16dp" android:textColor="@color/brand_celeste" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/tvSubtitulo" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Ingresa con tu cuenta para continuar" android:textSize="14sp" android:layout_marginTop="4dp" android:textColor="@android:color/darker_gray" />
<com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputLayout android:hint="@string/email_hint" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginTop="12dp">
<com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputEditText android:id="@+id/inputEmail" android:inputType="textEmailAddress" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" /> </com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputLayout>
<com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputLayout android:hint="@string/password_hint" app:endIconMode="password_toggle" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginTop="4dp">
<com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputEditText android:id="@+id/inputPass" android:inputType="textPassword" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" /> </com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputLayout>
<TextView android:id="@+id/tvForgot" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="@string/forgot_password" android:textStyle="bold" android:textColor="@color/brand_celeste" android:clickable="true" android:focusable="true" android:layout_marginTop="8dp" />
<com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton android:id="@+id/btnLogin" android:text="@string/login" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginTop="16dp" android:backgroundTint="@color/brand_celeste" android:textColor="@color/white" />
<com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton android:id="@+id/btnGoRegister" style="@style/Widget.Material3.Button.OutlinedButton" android:text="@string/register" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginTop="8dp" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/tvSeparator" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="@string/continue_with" android:gravity="center" android:textSize="14sp" android:textColor="@android:color/darker_gray" android:layout_marginTop="16dp" />
<!-- Botón Google --> <com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton android:id="@+id/btnGoogle" style="@style/Widget.Material3.Button.OutlinedButton" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginTop="8dp" android:text="@string/sign_in_with_google" app:icon="@drawable/ic_google" app:iconGravity="start" app:iconPadding="8dp" app:iconTint="@null" />
<!-- Botón Facebook --> <com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton android:id="@+id/btnFacebook" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginTop="8dp" android:text="@string/sign_in_with_facebook" android:backgroundTint="#1877F2" android:textColor="@android:color/white" app:icon="@drawable/ic_facebook" app:iconGravity="start" app:iconPadding="8dp" app:iconTint="@android:color/white" />
<ProgressBar android:id="@+id/progressBar" style="?android:attr/progressBarStyleLarge" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_gravity="center_horizontal" android:layout_marginTop="16dp" android:visibility="gone" /> </LinearLayout> </ScrollView>

option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <!-- Modern login/register activity with hero gradient, centered logo, elevated buttons and iconified input fields --> <androidx.coordinatorlayout.widget.CoordinatorLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:background="@drawable/gradient_primary">
<ScrollView android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent">
<LinearLayout android:orientation="vertical" android:padding="24dp" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:gravity="center_horizontal">
<com.google.android.material.card.MaterialCardView android:layout_width="200dp" android:layout_height="200dp" app:cardCornerRadius="100dp" app:cardElevation="8dp" android:layout_marginTop="24dp">
<ImageView android:id="@+id/imgLogo" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:src="@drawable/logo_silkroad" android:contentDescription="@string/hero_logo_desc" android:padding="12dp" android:scaleType="centerInside" /> </com.google.android.material.card.MaterialCardView>
<TextView android:id="@+id/tvHola" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="@string/welcome" android:textStyle="bold" android:textSize="22sp" android:layout_marginTop="16dp" android:textColor="@color/white" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/tvSubtitulo" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="@string/welcome_subtitle" android:textSize="14sp" android:layout_marginTop="4dp" android:textColor="@color/overlay_light" />
<com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputLayout android:hint="@string/email_hint" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginTop="20dp" app:startIconDrawable="@drawable/ic_person_24">
<com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputEditText android:id="@+id/inputEmail" android:inputType="textEmailAddress" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" /> </com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputLayout>
<com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputLayout android:hint="@string/password_hint" app:endIconMode="password_toggle" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginTop="8dp" app:startIconDrawable="@drawable/phone_enabled_24px">
<com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputEditText android:id="@+id/inputPass" android:inputType="textPassword" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" /> </com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputLayout>
<TextView android:id="@+id/tvForgot" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="@string/forgot_password" android:textStyle="bold" android:textColor="@color/white" android:clickable="true" android:focusable="true" android:layout_marginTop="8dp" />
<com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton android:id="@+id/btnLogin" android:text="@string/login" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginTop="16dp" style="@style/Widget.MaterialComponents.Button" app:backgroundTint="@color/primary" android:textColor="@color/white" app:cornerRadius="12dp" app:iconPadding="8dp" />
<com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton android:id="@+id/btnGoRegister" style="@style/Widget.MaterialComponents.Button.OutlinedButton" android:text="@string/create_account" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginTop="8dp" app:strokeColor="@color/white" app:cornerRadius="12dp" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/tvSeparator" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="@string/continue_with" android:gravity="center" android:textSize="14sp" android:textColor="@color/overlay_light" android:layout_marginTop="16dp" />
<com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton android:id="@+id/btnGoogle" style="@style/Widget.MaterialComponents.Button.OutlinedButton" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginTop="8dp" android:text="@string/sign_in_with_google" app:icon="@drawable/ic_google" app:iconGravity="textStart" app:iconTint="@null" />
<com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton android:id="@+id/btnFacebook" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginTop="8dp" android:text="@string/sign_in_with_facebook" app:backgroundTint="#1877F2" android:textColor="@color/white" app:icon="@drawable/ic_facebook" app:iconGravity="textStart" app:iconTint="@color/white" />
<ProgressBar android:id="@+id/progressBar" style="?android:attr/progressBarStyleLarge" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_gravity="center_horizontal" android:layout_marginTop="16dp" android:visibility="gone" />
</LinearLayout> </ScrollView> </androidx.coordinatorlayout.widget.CoordinatorLayout>

option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <LinearLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" android:orientation="vertical" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent">
<com.google.android.material.appbar.MaterialToolbar android:id="@+id/toolbar" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="?attr/actionBarSize" android:background="@color/brand_celeste" android:title="Tours" android:titleTextColor="@android:color/white" />
<ImageView android:id="@+id/imgTour" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="220dp" android:scaleType="centerCrop" android:layout_marginTop="16dp" android:background="#DDD" android:layout_marginBottom="16dp"/>
<ScrollView android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="0dp" android:layout_weight="1" android:fillViewport="true">
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="vertical" android:padding="16dp">
<TextView android:id="@+id/tTourName" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Tour 1" android:padding="8dp" android:textStyle="bold" android:textSize="20sp" android:layout_marginBottom="8dp"/>
<TextView android:id="@+id/tTourDescription" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Descripción del tour" android:padding="8dp" />
<!-- <TextView android:id="@+id/tTourLangs" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Idiomas: Inglés" android:padding="8dp" android:layout_marginBottom="8dp"/> --> <TextView android:id="@+id/tTourPeople" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Cupo: 10 personas" android:padding="8dp" android:layout_marginBottom="8dp"/>
<TextView android:id="@+id/tTourDateFrom" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Inicio: 20/10/2025" android:padding="8dp" android:layout_marginBottom="8dp"/>
<TextView android:id="@+id/tTourDateTo" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Fin: 22/10/2025" android:padding="8dp" android:layout_marginBottom="8dp"/>
<TextView android:id="@+id/tTourDuration" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Duración: 3 días" android:padding="8dp" android:layout_marginBottom="8dp"/>
</LinearLayout> </ScrollView>
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:gravity="center" android:padding="16dp">
<Button android:id="@+id/btnAdd" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Agregar S/. 100" android:backgroundTint="@color/brand_celeste" /> </LinearLayout> </LinearLayout>

option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <!-- Redesigned Tour Detail: immersive header, image gallery, info cards, map, reviews and bottom sheet CTA --> <androidx.coordinatorlayout.widget.CoordinatorLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent">
<com.google.android.material.appbar.AppBarLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="300dp">
<com.google.android.material.appbar.CollapsingToolbarLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" app:contentScrim="@color/primary" app:expandedTitleMarginStart="48dp" app:expandedTitleMarginEnd="64dp" app:layout_scrollFlags="scroll|exitUntilCollapsed">
<!-- Gallery slider (placeholder) --> <androidx.viewpager2.widget.ViewPager2 android:id="@+id/vpGallery" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" app:layout_collapseMode="parallax" />
<com.google.android.material.appbar.MaterialToolbar android:id="@+id/toolbar" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="?attr/actionBarSize" app:layout_collapseMode="pin" android:theme="@style/ThemeOverlay.MaterialComponents.Dark.ActionBar" />
</com.google.android.material.appbar.CollapsingToolbarLayout> </com.google.android.material.appbar.AppBarLayout>
<androidx.core.widget.NestedScrollView android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" app:layout_behavior="@string/appbar_scrolling_view_behavior">
<LinearLayout android:orientation="vertical" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:padding="16dp">
<TextView android:id="@+id/tTourName" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="@string/tour_title_placeholder" android:textSize="20sp" android:textStyle="bold" android:layout_marginTop="8dp" />
<!-- Quick info cards --> <LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="horizontal" android:layout_marginTop="12dp">
<com.google.android.material.card.MaterialCardView android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_weight="1" android:layout_height="wrap_content" app:cardCornerRadius="8dp" app:cardElevation="4dp">
<LinearLayout android:orientation="vertical" android:padding="12dp" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content">
<TextView android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="@string/label_duration" android:textSize="12sp" android:textColor="@color/neutral_500" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/tTourDuration" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="@string/duration_value" android:textStyle="bold" android:textSize="14sp" android:layout_marginTop="4dp" />
</LinearLayout> </com.google.android.material.card.MaterialCardView>
<com.google.android.material.card.MaterialCardView android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_weight="1" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginStart="8dp" app:cardCornerRadius="8dp" app:cardElevation="4dp">
<LinearLayout android:orientation="vertical" android:padding="12dp" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content">
<TextView android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="@string/label_capacity" android:textSize="12sp" android:textColor="@color/neutral_500" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/tTourPeople" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="@string/capacity_value" android:textStyle="bold" android:textSize="14sp" android:layout_marginTop="4dp" />
</LinearLayout> </com.google.android.material.card.MaterialCardView>
</LinearLayout>
<!-- Description --> <TextView android:id="@+id/tTourDescription" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginTop="12dp" android:text="@string/label_description" android:textSize="14sp" />
<!-- Map placeholder (integrate map later) --> <TextView android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="@string/label_map" android:textStyle="bold" android:layout_marginTop="12dp" />
<ImageView android:id="@+id/imgMap" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="180dp" android:layout_marginTop="8dp" android:scaleType="centerCrop" android:src="@drawable/ic_map_placeholder" android:contentDescription="@string/label_map" />
<!-- Reviews --> <TextView android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="@string/label_reviews" android:textStyle="bold" android:layout_marginTop="12dp" />
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="vertical" android:layout_marginTop="8dp">
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="horizontal" android:gravity="center_vertical">
<ImageView android:layout_width="36dp" android:layout_height="36dp" android:src="@drawable/ic_person_24" android:padding="8dp" android:contentDescription="@string/review_user_a" />
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="vertical" android:layout_marginStart="8dp">
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="@string/review_user_a" android:textStyle="bold" />
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="@string/review_sample" android:textSize="14sp" android:layout_marginTop="4dp" /> </LinearLayout> </LinearLayout> </LinearLayout>
<View android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="80dp" />
</LinearLayout>
</androidx.core.widget.NestedScrollView>
<!-- Bottom CTA (placeholder: can be replaced by BottomSheet) --> <LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_gravity="bottom" android:orientation="horizontal" android:padding="16dp" android:background="@color/surface_container">
<TextView android:id="@+id/tPrice" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_weight="1" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="@string/price_sample" android:textStyle="bold" android:textSize="18sp" android:gravity="center_vertical" />
<com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton android:id="@+id/btnAdd" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="@string/book_now" app:cornerRadius="10dp" app:backgroundTint="@color/primary" />
</LinearLayout>
</androidx.coordinatorlayout.widget.CoordinatorLayout>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <LinearLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" android:orientation="vertical" android:padding="12dp" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content">
<ImageView android:id="@+id/imgCompany" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="200dp" android:scaleType="centerCrop" android:src="@drawable/logo_silkroad"/>
<TextView android:id="@+id/tTitle" android:textStyle="bold" android:textSize="16sp" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/tRating" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:textColor="#666" /> </LinearLayout>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <!-- Redesigned company card: image hero, gradient overlay, rating stars, tour count and verified badge --> <com.google.android.material.card.MaterialCardView xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_margin="12dp" app:cardCornerRadius="16dp" app:cardElevation="4dp" app:cardUseCompatPadding="true">
<FrameLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content">
<ImageView android:id="@+id/imgCompany" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="180dp" android:scaleType="centerCrop" android:src="@drawable/logo_silkroad" android:contentDescription="@string/hero_logo_desc" />
<View android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="180dp" android:background="@drawable/overlay_gradient_dark" />
<!-- Verified badge --> <TextView android:id="@+id/badgeVerified" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginTop="12dp" android:layout_marginEnd="12dp" android:layout_gravity="top|end" android:padding="6dp" android:text="@string/verified" android:textColor="@color/white" android:textSize="12sp" android:background="@drawable/bg_badge_premium" android:visibility="gone" />
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="vertical" android:padding="12dp" android:layout_gravity="bottom">
<TextView android:id="@+id/tTitle" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:textColor="@color/white" android:textStyle="bold" android:textSize="16sp" android:maxLines="1" android:ellipsize="end" />
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="horizontal" android:gravity="center_vertical" android:layout_marginTop="6dp">
<!-- Rating stars --> <ImageView android:layout_width="18dp" android:layout_height="18dp" android:src="@drawable/ic_star" app:tint="@color/premium_gold" android:contentDescription="@string/rating_desc" /> <TextView android:id="@+id/tRating" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:textColor="@color/white" android:layout_marginStart="6dp" android:textSize="13sp" />
<!-- Dot separator --> <TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="@string/continue_with" android:textColor="@color/white" android:layout_marginStart="8dp" android:layout_marginEnd="8dp" />
<!-- Tours count --> <ImageView android:layout_width="16dp" android:layout_height="16dp" android:src="@drawable/ic_map" app:tint="@color/white" android:contentDescription="@string/duration_desc" /> <TextView android:id="@+id/tToursCount" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:textColor="@color/white" android:layout_marginStart="6dp" android:textSize="13sp" />
</LinearLayout>
</LinearLayout>
</FrameLayout>
</com.google.android.material.card.MaterialCardView>

<LinearLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" android:orientation="vertical" android:padding="12dp" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content">
<ImageView android:id="@+id/imgTour" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="180dp" android:scaleType="centerCrop"/>
<TextView android:id="@+id/tTourName" android:textStyle="bold" android:textSize="16sp" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content"/>
<TextView android:id="@+id/tTourPrice" android:textColor="#666" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content"/> <TextView android:id="@+id/tFecha" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content"/>
<TextView android:id="@+id/tTourDescription" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content"/>
</LinearLayout>

option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <!-- Redesigned item_tour.xml: modern Airbnb-style card with image, gradient overlay, badges and quick-info icons --> <com.google.android.material.card.MaterialCardView xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_margin="12dp" app:cardCornerRadius="16dp" app:cardElevation="4dp" app:strokeColor="@android:color/transparent" app:cardUseCompatPadding="true">
<FrameLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content">
<ImageView android:id="@+id/imgTour" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="200dp" android:scaleType="centerCrop" android:adjustViewBounds="true" android:contentDescription="@string/app_name" />
<!-- Dark gradient overlay for legibility --> <View android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="200dp" android:background="@drawable/overlay_gradient_dark" />
<!-- Floating badges --> <LinearLayout android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="horizontal" android:paddingStart="8dp" android:paddingEnd="8dp" android:layout_marginTop="12dp" android:layout_marginStart="12dp" android:layout_gravity="top|start">
<TextView android:id="@+id/badgeNew" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:paddingLeft="8dp" android:paddingRight="8dp" android:paddingTop="4dp" android:paddingBottom="4dp" android:text="@string/badge_new" android:textAllCaps="true" android:textSize="12sp" android:textColor="@color/white" android:background="@drawable/bg_badge_new" android:visibility="gone" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/badgePopular" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginStart="6dp" android:paddingLeft="8dp" android:paddingRight="8dp" android:paddingTop="4dp" android:paddingBottom="4dp" android:text="@string/badge_popular" android:textAllCaps="true" android:textSize="12sp" android:textColor="@color/white" android:background="@drawable/bg_badge_popular" android:visibility="gone" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/badgeOffer" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginStart="6dp" android:paddingLeft="8dp" android:paddingRight="8dp" android:paddingTop="4dp" android:paddingBottom="4dp" android:text="@string/badge_offer" android:textAllCaps="true" android:textSize="12sp" android:textColor="@color/white" android:background="@drawable/bg_badge_discount" android:visibility="gone" /> </LinearLayout>
<!-- Title and quick info placed at bottom of image --> <LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="vertical" android:padding="12dp" android:layout_gravity="bottom">
<TextView android:id="@+id/tTourName" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:textColor="@color/white" android:textStyle="bold" android:textSize="18sp" android:maxLines="2" android:ellipsize="end" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/tTourDescription" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:textColor="@color/white" android:textSize="13sp" android:maxLines="2" android:ellipsize="end" android:layout_marginTop="4dp" />
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="horizontal" android:layout_marginTop="8dp" android:gravity="center_vertical">
<!-- Duration --> <LinearLayout android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="horizontal" android:gravity="center_vertical" android:paddingEnd="12dp">
<ImageView android:layout_width="18dp" android:layout_height="18dp" android:src="@drawable/sp_menu_book_24px" app:tint="@color/white" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/tDuration" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:textColor="@color/white" android:textSize="12sp" android:layout_marginStart="6dp" /> </LinearLayout>
<!-- People --> <LinearLayout android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="horizontal" android:gravity="center_vertical" android:paddingEnd="12dp">
<ImageView android:layout_width="18dp" android:layout_height="18dp" android:src="@drawable/person_24px" app:tint="@color/white" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/tPeople" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:textColor="@color/white" android:textSize="12sp" android:layout_marginStart="6dp" /> </LinearLayout>
<!-- Rating --> <LinearLayout android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="horizontal" android:gravity="center_vertical">
<ImageView android:layout_width="18dp" android:layout_height="18dp" android:src="@drawable/ic_star" app:tint="@color/white" android:contentDescription="@string/rating_desc" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/tRating" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:textColor="@color/white" android:textSize="12sp" android:layout_marginStart="6dp" /> </LinearLayout> </LinearLayout> </LinearLayout>
</FrameLayout>
</com.google.android.material.card.MaterialCardView>
